entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 9:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

Temperature: 7.9°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 5.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 90 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
